name: Metal Fighter
description:
In 2077, the most popular things on the world is UMFS4[1].

[2]

Using two buttons only! The simplest FTG[3] in the world.


Second rule of UMFS4, push your opponent out of the ring.

Third rule of UMFS4, do not talk about the first rule.

[1]Ultra Metal Fighter Solid IV, A Robot Fighting Match In 2077
[2]That's Not Jotaro, I guess
[3]Fighting Game

Controls

GameShell / DEOTWindowsLeft PunchYIRight PunchUpUpEnterAJGo MainMenuB( hold )K( hold )Left Punch - Player2LHRight Punch - Player2RL

Team Members

Design/Code/Art - Noto

0.1 - 2020.1.13

  • Inspired by 老北京械斗

  • No time to do: Robot can replace their arms! Wait, nintendo already did it...
